      • getHash

        public java.lang.String getHash(long index)
        Description copied from interface: BackchainClient
        Hashes are stored to the Backchain sequentially in insertion order. This method returns the hash stored at the given index (starting from zero).
        Specified by:
        getHash in interface BackchainClient
        Parameters:
        index - index of the desired hash (starting from zero)
        Returns:
        hash at the given index

        Specified by:

        Returns:
        address of the entity acting as the Orchestrator for the Backchain

        public long hashCount()
        Description copied from interface: BackchainClient

        Returns:
        total number of hashes stored in the backchain

      • post

        public void post(java.lang.String hash)
        Description copied from interface: BackchainClient
        Posts a new hash to the Backchain. Available only to the Orchestrator.
        Specified by:
        post in interface BackchainClient
        Parameters:
